TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted but since I have no idea what that is I give you the wrong thing

I wish that I was not in high school better known as legal torture

Granted, you are now in college... (aka, one of the easiest parts of life).

I wish that I would stop derping around .

Granted, But now you turn crazy and start derping TO THE MAX!

I wish for 50 Billion dollars!

Granted but they are flaming $$

I wish that DE would fix Warframe

Granted, but due to a bug that came out with this fix they shut down the game. no refunds.

i wish for a truckload of water to appear on top of my flaming money (maybe i can get, like, 1 million out of it if i act fast!)

Granted but all the money get's washed away

I wish for 42
Off topic : are you addicted to 42?
that just like asking are you addicted to MLP

I wish for 42

Granted, but as you know the question AND the answer, the universe collapse to recreate itself in an even less understandable way.

I wish for the ability to click faster in Cookie Clicker.

that just like asking are you addicted to MLP

I would say yes to that question, it's a drug, realy.

Granted, but as you know the question AND the answer, the universe collapse to recreate itself in an even less understandable way.

I wish for the ability to click faster in Cookie Clicker.

Granted, But then your finger is doing everything faster, then it starts doing stuff TOO SOON. like staging.

I wish for..... Jeb to come back from ze dead.... again...

granted but he comes back with as a zombie vampire thing that is not a Badass

I wish that I understood why people are bronies

Granted you become a pony

I wish I was Jeb.

Granted. As you are headed to your next destination, you decide to poke your head outside forgetting your Eva pack.

I wish I didn't have to use my work laptop for ksp.

Granted, you now use a crappy $100 laptop

I wish for wishes...

Granted, but they are corrupted.

I wish it was November 23rd

granted but that date becomes meaningless to you because of 42

I wish for 42

Granted, but the 42 is made of paper and is on fire...

I wish that I could take a break from the forum games!

granted instead to go on 4chan/other things that may or may not be Pg-13/ you read all the fanfic on this site + this

I wish for nothing

Granted, the universe is now made of nothing...

I wish that I had my own custom flag...

granted but it causes another server crash do to how bad it is

I wish that you would stop following me

Granted, I stalk you instead...

I wish the forum games would stop taking over my life...
granted instead you read this(no really read it it's really good)

Granted, we are now in a universe where there are no such things as wishes...

I wish that I would play ksp right now

Also...

You must log in with an activated account to access the forums

granted but then you hdd/ssd fails on you

I wish for flaming pigs
